website_summaries.verdict: The highest-functioning Apple Watch on the market with the latest software.
pros: Always-on retina display so screen is always accessible
Allows you to make calls, send texts, and perform other phone functions even when your phone isn't near
Easy to download new apps and use Apple Pay

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: FIRST TIME APPLE WATCH PURCHASE! Very please what this new feature offers. Works very well with my iPhone 11 pro max. Really recommend for the people who have doubts.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts only 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: Battery only lasts 6 hours. Not a functional device if you have to recharge every six hours for a two hour charge, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Watch User

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Been a great addition so far really enjoying the motivation for being healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch has an amazing features. It can be use in different activates + time management.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz A. Alhassan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Apple phone companion
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Easy to use and so convenient especially when I’m at work
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Rather buy a new one
customer_reviews.text: The product was locked to previous owner’s apple account. It was also from a different series. Always hesitated to buy refurbished, but this was the worst case scenario you’d accept from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A disappointed customer.

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch !
customer_reviews.text: Great Watch and exactly what I needed, I would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Mahir Butt

customer_reviews.title: get one
customer_reviews.text: It is great for working out after my heart attack last August. I work out everyday for at least 2 hours and do not worry about my heart getting over 135 bpm
customer_reviews.author: Birddog

customer_reviews.title: More than a watch.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It took me a bit to figure out how to get both the phone and watch to ring simultaneously, but I’m not that technologically experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Smart watch
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Apple fan and love this watch. One of my best purchases
customer_reviews.author: Saad Shams

customer_reviews.title: A SmartWatch Indeed!
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for a year! no issue to date. I am regularly using my watch to track my exercise and routine. Costly but if you're using it properly, you will know it's benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur Patel

customer_reviews.title: Usability
customer_reviews.text: Run simple with no worries... A machine on my wrist to track except my mind... Yes it is
customer_reviews.author: Adonis87

customer_reviews.title: You must have it
customer_reviews.text: When you got one , the watch itself would describe everything on your wrist :)
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: I can even attach to the Internet away from my phone and entertain a phone conversation directly from the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the watch
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a gift..from what I understand he is very happy with the watch !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need a receipt to submit to Apple please
customer_reviews.text: I am reaching to out because I ordered the Apple Watch 5 and I am having trouble with it and need a receipt from you to get Apple to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Janmac55

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gadget
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. Amazon was selling it for $90 less than apple at the time i purchased it👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Ismael N.

customer_reviews.title: Many features, great quality, endless options.
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch, good for everyday use and wear and perfect for work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Simple user friendly
customer_reviews.text: My mom really loves this watch!! It is simple for her to figure out as an iPhone user.
customer_reviews.author: Esohe

customer_reviews.title: You don’t need a case for SS
customer_reviews.text: You know what this is. It’s the latest and greatest. I didn’t need an always on display. But stainless steel model holds up so much better then the aluminum. You shouldn’t need a case for a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Juswatjam

customer_reviews.title: Overall A Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Item/s arrived on time and performed as described. Good quality, price and fast delivery made this purchase an overall good deal. I recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: nyfb4u2cr

customer_reviews.title: Another great addition to the Apple Family
customer_reviews.text: The ECG capability is awesome. We love the expanded watch face complications and the ability to choose the always on function—should we want it. The lower profile and slightly larger screen are definitely a bonus. Thank you AMAZON for the BEST price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Cox

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what I expected. Very glad I went with the stainless steal. Unleaded from an older aluminum model. Very nice jump in quality, fit and finish. 44mm is the way to go for men.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Rader

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Brand new as advertised,,, I’ve had iwatch 2 & 3,, this sucker blows them away.... my only complaint is with Verizon... taking forever to connect cellar
customer_reviews.author: Mike schovanec

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing piece of technology. I use most functions every day. I love that you can make and receive phone calls away from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: Dr. asked me to get one to keep tabs on my heart. Seems to work fine.. Great chrono, compass, calc
customer_reviews.author: sdasaro

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It works well and is a perfect add on to iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Mutant Flicker

customer_reviews.title: Space Black case
customer_reviews.text: This is an elite upgrade to the Apple watch 5. I love how versatile this watch is...dressed up or down. It is the best gift you can buy!
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

product_meta.title: Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS + Cellular, 44mm) - Space Black Stainless Steel Case with Black Sport Band
feature_bullets: Built-in cellular lets you receive calls, send texts, and check your email — even without your phone.
You don’t have to raise your wrist or tap to see the time or important information. With the Always-On Retina display, your watch face is always visible.
The viewing area stretches deep into the curved corners and is over 30% larger than the Apple Watch Series 3 display.
Made for all the ways you exercise, Apple Watch Series 5 has built-in GPS and is swimproof.
With the ECG app, you can take an ECG similar to a single-lead electrocardiogram right from your wrist.
The optical heart sensor can monitor your heart rate and alert you to a high or low heart rate.
You can store your favorite music, podcasts, and audiobooks on your watch. And stream it all — including the entire Apple Music catalog — even without your phone.
A built-in compass and GPS enable precise navigation through Maps, while the altimeter tells you how high you go — great for outdoor workouts.
Emergency SOS lets you call for help right from your wrist, even when you’re not near your phone.
International emergency calling automatically connects you to local emergency services when you’re traveling abroad.
